mapper.update: update app_rpt_cash_flow set rpt_cash_flow_id = #{rptCashFlowId}, rpt_cash_flow_name = #{rptCashFlowName}, date_from = #{dateFrom}, date_until = #{dateUntil}, account_no = #{accountNo}, ending_balance_debit = #{endingBalanceDebit}, ending_balance_credit = #{endingBalanceCredit}, date_created = #{dateCreated}, created_by = #{createdBy} where rpt_cash_flow_id = #{rptCashFlowId};
